snippet.title: Serum - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Add the game to your Wishlist: https://bit.ly/SerumSteam

Intoxicated with a deadly virus, you have to find the cure and reveal the secrets of the mysterious Serum. How far will you go in this race against the time?

Join our Discord server: https://bit.ly/GIDiscord
Follow us on Steam: https://bit.ly/GameIslandSteam
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameIslandSA
